abstract: General Electric is adding new operations at two of its manufacturing hubs, underlining what the company says is a new commitment to producing in the United States.
snippet: General Electric is adding new operations at two of its manufacturing hubs, underlining what the company says is a new commitment to producing in the United States.
lead_paragraph: For the first time in decades, General Electric is adding new operations at two of its manufacturing hubs, underlining what the company says is a new commitment to producing in the United States.

headline.main: G.E. to Add Two New U.S. Plants as Unions Agree on Cost Controls
headline.print_headline: G.E. to Add Two New U.S. Plants as Unions Agree on Cost Controls

abstract: Explaining some changes in a column about General Electric’s accounting practices.
snippet: Explaining some changes in a column about General Electric’s accounting practices.
lead_paragraph: The column on General Electric that ran in today’s print edition of The New York Times, and that now appears on the Internet, differs in a few ways from the one that was posted on nytimes.com on Thursday afternoon, and from the version that ran in the Friday editions of The International Herald Tribune.

abstract: An earlier version of this column posted online referred imprecisely to one assertion in a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint against General Electric, and misinterpreted one aspect of the complaint at another point. The corrections reflected in this revised version are explained by Floyd Norris in a post on his blog.
lead_paragraph: An earlier version of this column posted online referred imprecisely to one assertion in a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint against General Electric, and misinterpreted one aspect of the complaint at another point. The corrections reflected in this revised version are explained by Floyd Norris in a post on his blog.
